title: Prologue to a Supposed Play - effect of couplets

content.question: Which of the following best describes the effect of the poem’s rhyming couplets?

choices.label: They playfully make the poem’s unpleasant points more palatable.
They create a light tone to emphasize the frivolous themes of the play.
They explicitly mock the audience’s expectations.
They mirror the rapid shifts in the speaker’s thoughts.

content.answer: They playfully make the poem’s unpleasant points more palatable.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
